yet another torrent without an explanitory comment, i suppose its my duty.

this torrent works fine.
to install:
1. download the torrent to find the ".rar" file, extract this file using extraction software e.g. winrar
2. open the "setup" file and follow it like normal until it asks you for a username and ID, where you shall type anything you want, as many letters as can fit 
3. click OFFLINE activation
4. when it asks you for the serial number just use the same username/id (i cant remember which one it asked for) as you did before, put this in the KEYGEN
5. copy and paste into the installation prompt
and it should work.
